gesture_flick_speed: This function is used to set the speed required for a Flick Gesture event to be triggered when a touch or click is released. The speed is measured in inches per second and has a default value of 2.0.
The speed (in inches per second) to set for flick gesture event detection.
The above code checks to see if the flick speed for gestures is set to 2 inches per second and if it is not it sets it to that value.
